name: Odd Eye Color
description: The character’s eyes differ in color or shade, potentially giving them a unique, unsettling appearance.

name: Odd Hair Color
description: Hair exhibits an unusual color variation, deviating from typical human hues.

name: Odd Skin Color
description: Skin tone is irregular, possibly marked by patches or shifts in coloration.

name: Unnatural Strength
description: Add 1d20 (rolled at character creation) to the strength score, representing bursts of anomalous power.

name: Bony Ridges on Knuckles
description: Provides an additional +20 to +30 STR. These prominent ridges may also serve as natural weapons.

name: Fangs
description: The character develops pronounced canine teeth, enhancing their predatory appearance and possibly their bite attack.

name: Multiple Voices
description: The character can produce several simultaneous vocalizations, which might confuse foes or affect social interactions.

name: Claws
description: Natural claw formations appear on the hands, potentially useful for combat or climbing.

name: Pointed Ears
description: The ears become distinctly pointed, giving the character an elfin or otherworldly look.

name: Minor Teleport
description: Short-range teleportation ability, useful for quickly evading danger or repositioning in combat.

name: Unnatural Speed
description: Run speed increases by +20 MPH, +10 to dodge checks, and +10 to initiative, enhancing overall mobility in combat and exploration.

name: Aura of Mistrust
description: An unsettling presence causes others to feel wary, potentially influencing social interactions and NPC reactions.

name: Aura of Trust
description: The character exudes an aura that inspires confidence and trust in allies and acquaintances.

name: Wall Climbing
description: Grants the ability to climb vertical surfaces, allowing access to otherwise unreachable areas.

name: Frog Skin Ability
description: Skin takes on qualities similar to amphibian skin, perhaps offering resistance to water or environmental changes.

name: Slow Aging
description: The aging process is significantly decelerated (aging at ½ the normal rate), extending the character’s prime years.

name: Energy Discharge from Hands
description: Random energy discharge with a range up to 100, dealing 20-30 damage points as an offensive ability.

name: Prehensile Tail
description: A tail develops that can grasp objects, providing utility in combat, climbing, or handling tasks.

name: Fast Healing
description: Heals at a rate determined by 1d20 per round, greatly enhancing natural regeneration beyond standard healing.

name: Cognitive Reflex
description: Heightens reflexes related to mental processing, possibly aiding in quick decision-making or reaction to stimuli.
